con:request.name: Request 1

con:testStep.name: Generate JWT Token for Create Cycle.

con:restRequest.name: Create cycle in JIRA

con:assertion.name: Script Assertion - Store cycle id in property.

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def ResponseMessage = messageExchange.response.responseContent def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper().parseText(ResponseMessage) def cycleid= jsonSlurper.id
context.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue('cycleid', cycleid.toString())

con:testStep.name: Generate JWT Token for Add Test in Cycle.

con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def ResponseMessage = messageExchange.response.responseContent def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper().parseText(ResponseMessage) def issueid= jsonSlurper.id
context.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue('issueID', issueid.toString())

con:testStep.name: Generate JWT Token for getting Execution ID.

con:configuration.scriptText: import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def ResponseMessage = messageExchange.response.responseContent def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper().parseText(ResponseMessage) def executionid= jsonSlurper.execution.id log.info jsonSlurper.execution.id context.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue('executionid', executionid.toString())

con:testStep.name: Generate JWT Token for Execute TestCase in JIRA.

con:testCase.name: NS-2 Verify that systeminfo api working correctly.
